title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
description: When using the new class wizard in Build 20011106, the field for 'Enclosing Type' is blank when it should default to the current type in the editor.
OB: When I have a .java file open in the editor and click the new class button, the field for 'Enclosing Type' is blank.
EB: The field for 'Enclosing Type' should default to the current type in the editor.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open a .java file in the editor.
2. Click the new class button.
3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' field in the wizard. It should default to the current type in the editor.
